Articles.Content:
New music, new vibe. I had the day off and it's been a while since I posted music on here.

https://soundcloud.com/billy-winn-2/planet-x

Let me know what you think!

Dude. Squad should hire you to make the score

ZodiaK. I'm not enven joking

Thanks Zodiak! I think that Squad is doing a fantastic job with their music. I give much respect to their audio team. I wouldn't mind connecting with a team somewhere to use this music in. I would love to be able to get better audio samples and push the limit. For now I am happy just to have people listen and enjoy the music

Hmm... Sounds a lot more like it would be a kind of military fanfare, and not so much peaceful explorers.

Other than that i think it would be great for kerbal space program!
I hear ya Rewdew2. I actually envision an anime battlecruiser flying through space. My crazy brain envisions the entire scene even the hyperspace jump. Funny how that works lol

Wow, just wow.

2 things

1. I images I imagine Neil Armstrong standing on the surface of the moon with the view point slowly panning around slowly stopping on the earth with the sun just setting below it.

2. Can I please add this to my 'kerbal time capsule project' project as a nostalgia project for us to look back at the old versions from, say 1.0.

Anyway, brillant peice
Thanks guys! Feel free SpaceSphereOfDeath. Let me know where I can send you the WAV or MP3. I am always glad to have music used somewhere lol.

Thanks Zodiak! I think that Squad is doing a fantastic job with their music. I give much respect to their audio team. I wouldn't mind connecting with a team somewhere to use this music in. I would love to be able to get better audio samples and push the limit. For now I am happy just to have people listen and enjoy the music

Actually apart from the menu music, it's all public domain stuff from Kevin MacLeod.

Really? I didn't know that. I thought he was working directly with him actually. I fail at doing my homework there, lol. They seem to be happy with what they have though. If they ever asked, I'd let them use some without cost. As a new musician, it's always good to get the name out there a bit. Right now I am a computer tech, would love to change over to musician lol. Always takes time though, well, that and I am terrible at getting myself into the media stream of the Indie world.

Publicity is my weakness hahaha

BTW, if you hear something on my Soundcloud that you like and want to use, let me know.

Best way to contact me is via email [email protected]

https://soundcloud.com/billy-winn-2
The fast beat, instruments and general epicness remind me of Chrono Trigger's main theme. Nicely done.
Thanks! Chrono Trigger is one of my all time favorite games. I am glad it brings up memories of such a great game.

Thanks guys! Feel free SpaceSphereOfDeath. Let me know where I can send you the WAV or MP3. I am always glad to have music used somewhere lol.

I'll just post the link to the sound cloud page on my post

EDIT: nova, your post count...

IT'S OVAH 3999!

Edited September 17, 2013 by SpaceSphereOfDeath

Hmm... Sounds a lot more like it would be a kind of military fanfare, and not so much peaceful explorers.

Other than that i think it would be great for kerbal space program!

They may be peaceful explorers but they're still thundering into the heavens on a stack of rocket engines! Tell me that doesn't need some music to get the blood pumping.

Great piece!

Thanks KSK! Every launch I see and explosions projecting me to outer space. I agree, I am hoping to nail down a launch song soon. It's been slipping in and out of my head for a few weeks. I need to get it down as a track.

Stay Tuned!
